name: Tomato-and-Onion Salad
keywords: lemon juice, onion, tomato, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled and very thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: On a large platter, alternate the tomato and onion slices in slightly overlapping layers. Place the cumin seeds in a small skillet over medium heat and toast until fragrant, shaking the pan frequently to prevent burning. Coarsely chop the seeds and combine with the remaining ingredients. Spoon over the tomatoes and onions. Let stand at least 30 minutes before serving.
